content:
Ultramarines are natural leaders and the embodiment of the Codex Astartes. In battle their purity and natural authority is a power force, able to rally their fellow Battle- Brothers and reinforce their will to fight. When a Battle- Brother uses this ability, it instantly restores a number of Cohesion equal to his Fellowship Bonus. The reverence the Ultramarines hold for their Primarch and the strength of will required to make a Rally Cry is such that a Battle-Brother may only use this ability once per game session.

Improvement: This ability cannot be improved.
